text.text_translated:
Some people write their dreams. This can help them have lucid dreams.
What are lucid dreams? They are dreams where you know you are dreaming. You can change what happens in them.
So, you can change a bad dream. You can make it a good dream. You can also control the dream's story. You are like a film director.
Then, you do not just understand your dreams. You make them. But maybe you want to keep some dreams. These dreams let your brain tell you things.
